adventOfCodeConfig.description: Configuration for tracking Advent of Code puzzle availability and completion status
notes: This configuration tracks all Advent of Code years and their available days.
To add a new year (e.g., 2026), simply add a new entry with the year and totalDays.
The solutions_database.json file tracks which puzzles have been solved.
When selecting a random puzzle, exclude any year/day combinations already in solutions_database.json.
Never select a puzzle from a future year or day that hasn't been released yet.
